markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Surface Skimmer](/Feats.aspx?ID=2674) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Azarketi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=336" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Absalom, City of Lost Omens](/Sources.aspx?ID=108) pg. 394, [Azarketi Ancestry Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=76) pg. 4</row>

</column>

---

By sinking gently beneath the waves, you obscure your presence and utilize the water as a barrier between you and land combatants. While you are submerged just below the water's surface, you have cover from attacks made by creatures out of the water.
name: Surface Skimmer
